document_data.name: ''Javelin of Piercing''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''javelin of piercing''''' was a [[magic]]al [[javelin]] that could be launched via a [[command word]].
document_data.Description: These single-use magic [[weapon]]s were usually found in a collections of two to eight. When thrown, they could take any path up to their maximum range.
document_data.Powers: ''Javelins of piercing'' were effectively ''+6'' [[weapon]]s, and could be hurled up to {{SI|180|ft}}. These weapons only had a single charge each; once hurled, they reverted to normal javelins.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''javelins of piercing'' were used all over [[Toril]], particularly in [[Faerûn]], [[Zakhara]], and [[Kara-Tur]].
